reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 337/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - PLANS OF SUBDIVISION AND CONDOMINIUMS, TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — PLANS OF SUBDIVISION AND CONDOMINIUMS, TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 337/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - PLANS OF SUBDIVISION AND CONDOMINIUMS, TOWN OF SIOUX LOOKOUT
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the Town of Sioux Lookout with respect to all applications made after July 1, 1998 for land in that municipality. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the Town of Sioux Lookout with respect to all applications made after July 1, 1998 for land in that municipality. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Town of Sioux Lookout with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Town of Sioux Lookout with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the Town of Sioux Lookout or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 3 (1). (2) The delegations of authority in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the Town of Sioux Lookout or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 3 (1).

(2) The delegations of authority in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 337/98, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 337/98, s. 4. SCHEDULE 60–T–94004 O. Reg. 337/98, Sched.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 337/98, s. 4.

SCHEDULE

60–T–94004

O. Reg. 337/98, Sched.
